title: Clinically Studied Ingredient
alt: Blatantly banking on customers not understanding that it's like a Hollywood studio advertising that their new movie was 'watched by Roger Ebert'.
transcript:
I can't help but admire the audacity of the marketer who came up with the phrase "contains a clinically studied ingredient"[Megan and Cueball are about to enter a bed for sex.]
Megan: Don't worry - I've been tested.
Cueball: ...and you're clean?
Megan: So many questions!
